message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product. It's a rare opportunity to acquire something truly unique and valuable. I'm willing to start with a price of $1,500,000. I believe this is a fair starting point considering the product's worth to you.

Alice, while I appreciate your enthusiasm, $1,500,000 is well above my budget.  I'm willing to start at $900,000, but I'm open to negotiating a fair price that works for both of us.  Let's see if we can find common ground.

I understand that $900,000 is a bit low for me, but I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1,200,000. This is the lowest I can go, considering the product's value to me. Let's see if we can find a mutually beneficial price.

Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but $1,200,000 is still a bit high for me. I'm prepared to offer $1,050,000.  I believe this is a fair compromise that respects both our positions. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.

I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $1,100,000, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for this product. I'm not willing to go any lower than this, so let's see if you can meet me here.

Alice, I think we're both getting close to a point where we can make this deal work. I'm willing to go up to $1,075,000, which is closer to your position while still keeping me within my budget. Let's see if we can close this deal this round.

I appreciate your flexibility, Bob, but I'm not quite ready to accept $1,075,000. I'm willing to make one more concession and meet you at $1,080,000. This is the last time I'll be willing to budge, so let's see if we can finalize the deal.
